text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the MSI GL Series GL75 9SEK-056 17.3" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL75 9SEK-056 17.3" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL75 9SEK-056 17.3" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL75 9SEK-056 17.3" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL75 9SEK-056 17.3" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
